```{r label = winning_pct, fig.width = 12, echo = FALSE}
library(uncmbb)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
#library(scales)
df_pct <- unc %>% count(Season, Result) %>% group_by(Season) %>% mutate(pct = n/sum(n)) %>% filter(Result == "W") %>% ungroup()
#head(df_pct)

df_pct %>%
  mutate(season = substr(Season, 3, 4)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Season, y = pct)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line(group = 1) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent) +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 1, hjust = 1))

```
